createdAt.description: The time when this cluster was registered with Signadot.
The time when this cluster was registered with Signadot.

lastConnectedAt.description: The last time at which this token was used to connect.

lastConnectedIp.description: The last IP address from which this token connected.

cluster.description: Cluster that the resource is created in

sandbox.description: Name of the sandbox containing the resource

createdAt.description: The time at which the resource plugin was created

updatedAt.description: The time at which the resource plugin was last updated

version.description:
The operator version of the cluster.  This may be
nil if the cluster has not yet connected to Signadot.

namespace.description: Namespace to create this runner instance in

create.description: Create refers to the `create` steps for spinning up the resource

delete.description: Delete refers to the `delete` steps for spinning up the resource

resources.description: Resources created using the resource plugin

script.description: Script to execute in the step

valueFromSandbox.description: ValueFromSandbox defines whether or not to source value from the sandbox spec

env.description:
Inject the input as an env variable with name Env inside the
main container

path.description: Expose the input as a file at Path inside the main container

valueFromPath.description: Path within the main container from where the output will be read

output.description: Name of the variable from the step

all.description:
When All is non-nil, T matches a set of labels if and only if every element of All matches them.
Only one field may be non-nil.

any.description:
When Any is non-nil, T matches a set of labels if and only if some element of Any matches them.
Only one field may be non-nil.

key.description:
Key is an exact match on a label key, glob
characters are just considered normal characters.

value.description:
Value is a glob match for the value of a
sandbox label.  See https://pkg.go.dev/path/filepath#Match
for the file glob syntax.

cluster.description: Cluster gives the cluster to which the route group applies.

description.description: Description provides a short description of the route group.

endpoints.description:
Endpoints define endpoints which target different in-cluster
services.

matchedSandboxes.description:
MatchedSandboxes gives the list of sandboxes whose labels
were matched by the 'match' object in the spec.

message.description:
Message is a human readable explanation of why
the sandbox is healthy or not.

ready.description:
Ready indicates whether the sandbox is ready,
meaning that it can be used for testing.

reason.description:
Reason is a machine readable explanation of why
the sandbox is healthy or not.

scheduledDeleteTime.description:
ScheduledDeleteTime returns the formatted and computed ttl based on the Duration
and OffsetFrom

duration.description:
Duration represents the duration until routegroup's end of life.
It should be an unsigned integer not exceeding 32 bits followed by
a units character, which can be one of the following.
  - 'm' for minutes
  - 'h' for hours
  - 'd' for days
  - 'w' for weeks

offsetFrom.description:
OffsetFrom indicates what the Duration is relative to.  It
may be the empty string, "noMatchedSandboxes", "createdAt" or "updatedAt". The empty string
defaults to meaning "noMatchedSandboxes".

env.description: Environment variable modifications that will be applied to the forked workload

images.description: One or more docker images that will be applied to the forked workload

container.description: name of container to which it applies

port.description: Port it will map to on the forked workload

kind.description: Kind of entity that we want to route to. One of (Service or Deployment or Rollout).

name.description: Name of the entity within the Kubernetes cluster.

namespace.description: Namespace within which the entity lives in the Kubernetes cluster.

host.description: Hostname that this endpoint points to

port.description: Port it will map to on the specified host

container.description: Container is the container this image must apply to in the forked workload

message.description:
Message is a human readable explanation of why
the sandbox is healthy or not.

ready.description:
Ready indicates whether the sandbox is ready,
meaning that it can be used for testing.

reason.description:
Reason is a machine readable explanation of why
the sandbox is healthy or not.

cluster.description: Cluster within which this sandbox should be created

description.description: Description of the purpose of this sandbox

forks.description: Forks is the specification of each forked entity

labels.description: Labels are used to specify metadata associated with the sandbox as key-value pairs.

resources.description: Resources specifies each required resource to spin up the sandbox

duration.description:
Duration represents the duration until sandbox end of life.
It should be an unsigned integer not exceeding 32 bits followed by
a units character, which can be one of the following.
  - 'm' for minutes
  - 'h' for hours
  - 'd' for days
  - 'w' for weeks

offsetFrom.description:
OffsetFrom indicates what the Duration is relative to.  It
may be the empty string, "createdAt" or "updatedAt".  The empty string
defaults to meaning "createdAt".

delete.description: Remove a Kubernetes cluster from Signadot.

put.description: Add a Kubernetes cluster to Signadot.

post.description: Create a new token for connecting a cluster.

get.description: List the cluster tokens associated with a cluster.

delete.description: Delete a cluster token associated with a cluster.

get.description: Get a cluster token associated with a cluster.
List all resource plugins under the specified Signadot org.

delete.description: Delete the resource plugin by name

get.description: Get the specified resource plugin by name

put.description: Apply a resource plugin. Updates are not supported at this time.

parameters.description: Request to create or update a resource plugin
parameters.name: data

get.description: List all routegroups under the specified Signadot org.
Fetch the details about a given routegroup.

put.description: Creates or updates a routegroup with the provided parameters.

parameters.description: Request to create or update routegroup
parameters.name: data

get.description: List all sandboxes under the specified Signadot org.
Fetch the details about a given sandbox.

put.description: Creates or updates a sandbox with the provided parameters.
